{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Full Stack Web Development Instructor",
  "description": "Deejoft Technologies is a leading tech company specializing in cybersecurity, product management, software engineering, data science, data analysis, DevOps, web development, and robotics. We offer innovative solutions and educational programs to help individuals and organizations thrive in the digital age. Our mission is to empower the next generation of tech professionals with cutting-edge skills and knowledge

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Web&nbsp;Development&nbsp;Instructor

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Deejoft Technologies is seeking a passionate and skilled Full Stack Web Development Instructor to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for teaching and mentoring students in both front-end and back-end web development.
	You will design and deliver engaging lessons, provide hands-on training, and support students in building real-world projects.
	The role requires strong technical expertise, excellent communication skills, and a commitment to helping learners succeed in the tech industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Teach and mentor students in front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next Js) and back-end (Node.js, Express, Python) development.
	Prepare lesson plans, curriculum, and projects that align with industry standards.
	Provide one-on-one and group support to students, ensuring concepts are well understood.
	Assess student performance and give constructive feedback.
	Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
	Foster a positive and inclusive learning environment.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or Instructor.
	Strong proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies.
	Experience with version control (Git/GitHub).
	Excellent communication, teaching, and mentoring skills.
	Passion for technology and education.


Salary
N70,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@deejoft.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-20",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Deejoft Technologies"
    
  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

Full Stack Web Development Instructor Job at Deejoft Technologies




        
    

        
        Deejoft Technologies is a leading tech company specializing in cybersecurity, product management, software engineering, data science, data analysis, DevOps, web development, and robotics. We offer innovative solutions and educational programs to help individuals and organizations thrive in the digital age. Our mission is to empower the next generation of tech professionals with cutting-edge skills and knowledge

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full Stack Web Development Instructor

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Deejoft Technologies is seeking a passionate and skilled Full Stack Web Development Instructor to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for teaching and mentoring students in both front-end and back-end web development.
	You will design and deliver engaging lessons, provide hands-on training, and support students in building real-world projects.
	The role requires strong technical expertise, excellent communication skills, and a commitment to helping learners succeed in the tech industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Teach and mentor students in front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next Js) and back-end (Node.js, Express, Python) development.
	Prepare lesson plans, curriculum, and projects that align with industry standards.
	Provide one-on-one and group support to students, ensuring concepts are well understood.
	Assess student performance and give constructive feedback.
	Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in web development.
	Foster a positive and inclusive learning environment.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or Instructor.
	Strong proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies.
	Experience with version control (Git/GitHub).
	Excellent communication, teaching, and mentoring skills.
	Passion for technology and education.


Salary
N70,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@deejoft.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "ELV Engineer",
  "description": "Mar&amp;Mor Integrated Services Limited&nbsp;is a building services company that is passionate about customer satisfaction, best practices and standards compliance. We provide semi-last mile services to improve nearly every aspect of your mechanical and electrical installations. We Design, Procure, install and maintain Heating,Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) systems, water treatment, Firefighting and water supply systems as well as power supply, electrical network and communication systems to meet industrial, commercial or residential requirements. We also provide quality general plumbing services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ELV Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced ELV Engineer with proven expertise in the design, installation, testing, commissioning, and maintenance of Extra Low Voltage (ELV) systems.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience across multiple ELV services including CCTV, access control, fire suppression, fire detection and alarm systems, Building Management Systems (BMS), and other related technologies.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, implement, and maintain ELV systems including: CCTV surveillance, Access control, Fire detection and suppression, BMS, and other ELV services.
	Perform site surveys, prepare technical documentation, and support system design and integration.
	Supervise installation, configuration, and commissioning of ELV systems in compliance with project specifications and industry standards.
	Conduct troubleshooting, testing, and preventive maintenance of ELV systems.
	Collaborate with contractors, consultants, and project teams to ensure timely project delivery.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, codes, and standards.
	Provide technical support, training, and guidance to junior engineers/technicians.
	Maintain accurate project documentation, reports, and as-built drawings.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree / Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Communications, or related fields.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience working as an ELV Engineer or in a similar role.
	Strong hands-on knowledge of ELV systems including CCTV, access control, fire detection &amp; suppression, and BMS.
	Familiarity with relevant international standards (NFPA, BS, EN, etc.) and local authority regulations.
	Proficient in reading and interpreting technical drawings and schematics.
	Good understanding of networking protocols (IP addressing, TCP/IP) for integrated ELV solutions.
	Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
	Strong communication and coordination abilities.
	Ability to work independently and within a team under tight deadlines.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@marandmor.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only successful candidates will be contacted and late entries will not be entertained",

ELV Engineer Job at Mar&Mor Integrated Services Limited




        
    

        
        Mar&Mor Integrated Services Limited is a building services company that is passionate about customer satisfaction, best practices and standards compliance. We provide semi-last mile services to improve nearly every aspect of your mechanical and electrical installations. We Design, Procure, install and maintain Heating,Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) systems, water treatment, Firefighting and water supply systems as well as power supply, electrical network and communication systems to meet industrial, commercial or residential requirements. We also provide quality general plumbing services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: ELV Engineer
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking an experienced ELV Engineer with proven expertise in the design, installation, testing, commissioning, and maintenance of Extra Low Voltage (ELV) systems.
	The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience across multiple ELV services including CCTV, access control, fire suppression, fire detection and alarm systems, Building Management Systems (BMS), and other related technologies.


Key Responsibilities


	Design, implement, and maintain ELV systems including: CCTV surveillance, Access control, Fire detection and suppression, BMS, and other ELV services.
	Perform site surveys, prepare technical documentation, and support system design and integration.
	Supervise installation, configuration, and commissioning of ELV systems in compliance with project specifications and industry standards.
	Conduct troubleshooting, testing, and preventive maintenance of ELV systems.
	Collaborate with contractors, consultants, and project teams to ensure timely project delivery.
	Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, codes, and standards.
	Provide technical support, training, and guidance to junior engineers/technicians.
	Maintain accurate project documentation, reports, and as-built drawings.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree / Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Communications, or related fields.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience working as an ELV Engineer or in a similar role.
	Strong hands-on knowledge of ELV systems including CCTV, access control, fire detection & suppression, and BMS.
	Familiarity with relevant international standards (NFPA, BS, EN, etc.) and local authority regulations.
	Proficient in reading and interpreting technical drawings and schematics.
	Good understanding of networking protocols (IP addressing, TCP/IP) for integrated ELV solutions.
	Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
	Strong communication and coordination abilities.
	Ability to work independently and within a team under tight deadlines.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@marandmor.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only successful candidates will be contacted and late entries will not be entertained    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Reliable Plastic was incorporated on April 28th, 1998. We have been committed to providing the best quality products to our customers since its inception. Apart from the outstanding service that is provided, consumers are sure to be completely satisfied with the end product. Reliable Plastic promises to use only quality material for your product. Everything is done in-house with the company and therefore is your one-stop shop for product manufacturing. The difference is our service! We stand behind our products and provide the best, most comprehensive ongoing customer service. We take the time to learn about your needs and work with you to provide the best fastening solutions for your specific application and welcome orders requiring our custom fabrication services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control Superintendent

Job Location:&nbsp;Onitsha, Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and certified Quality Control Superintendent with strong expertise in quality control and assurance to oversee and maintain product quality standards.
	The ideal candidate will have 3&ndash;5 years of relevant experience in quality management, with a background in plastics manufacturing being a strong advantage.


Key Responsibilities


	Supervise, coordinate, and monitor the daily activities of the Quality Control (QC) team.
	Develop, implement, and maintain quality control procedures to ensure compliance with company standards and regulatory requirements.
	Inspect raw materials, in-process production, and finished products to verify compliance with specifications.
	Lead root cause analysis, corrective action, and continuous improvement initiatives to reduce defects and enhance product quality.
	Ensure calibration and proper use of testing equipment and laboratory instruments.
	Prepare and present quality performance reports to management.
	Provide training, coaching, and mentorship to QC staff to maintain a culture of quality.
	Collaborate with production, engineering, and R&amp;D teams to resolve quality-related issues.
	Enforce safety and hygiene standards in line with company and industry regulations.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Quality Management, Industrial Engineering, Chemistry, or a related field.
	Professional certification(s) in Quality Control / Quality Assurance (e.g., ISO, Six Sigma, ASQ Certified Quality Engineer or similar) is mandatory.
	3&ndash;5 years of proven experience in Quality Control/Quality Assurance roles, preferably in a manufacturing environment.
	Strong knowledge of quality management systems (QMS), ISO standards, and regulatory compliance.
	Experience in plastic manufacturing processes will be a strong advantage.
	Excellent leadership, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	Strong analytical ability with attention to detail.


Skills &amp; Competencies:


	In-depth understanding of quality tools, techniques, and statistical process control.
	Ability to manage and motivate a team effectively.
	Proficiency in MS Office and quality management software.
	Strong organizational and time management skills.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested candidates should send their resume to:&nbsp;reliablesteelplasticrecruit@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Quality Control Superintendent Job at Reliable Steel and Plastic Industry Limited




        
    

        
        Reliable Plastic was incorporated on April 28th, 1998. We have been committed to providing the best quality products to our customers since its inception. Apart from the outstanding service that is provided, consumers are sure to be completely satisfied with the end product. Reliable Plastic promises to use only quality material for your product. Everything is done in-house with the company and therefore is your one-stop shop for product manufacturing. The difference is our service! We stand behind our products and provide the best, most comprehensive ongoing customer service. We take the time to learn about your needs and work with you to provide the best fastening solutions for your specific application and welcome orders requiring our custom fabrication services.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Quality Control Superintendent

Job Location: Onitsha, Anambra
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly skilled and certified Quality Control Superintendent with strong expertise in quality control and assurance to oversee and maintain product quality standards.
	The ideal candidate will have 3–5 years of relevant experience in quality management, with a background in plastics manufacturing being a strong advantage.


Key Responsibilities


	Supervise, coordinate, and monitor the daily activities of the Quality Control (QC) team.
	Develop, implement, and maintain quality control procedures to ensure compliance with company standards and regulatory requirements.
	Inspect raw materials, in-process production, and finished products to verify compliance with specifications.
	Lead root cause analysis, corrective action, and continuous improvement initiatives to reduce defects and enhance product quality.
	Ensure calibration and proper use of testing equipment and laboratory instruments.
	Prepare and present quality performance reports to management.
	Provide training, coaching, and mentorship to QC staff to maintain a culture of quality.
	Collaborate with production, engineering, and R&D teams to resolve quality-related issues.
	Enforce safety and hygiene standards in line with company and industry regulations.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Quality Management, Industrial Engineering, Chemistry, or a related field.
	Professional certification(s) in Quality Control / Quality Assurance (e.g., ISO, Six Sigma, ASQ Certified Quality Engineer or similar) is mandatory.
	3–5 years of proven experience in Quality Control/Quality Assurance roles, preferably in a manufacturing environment.
	Strong knowledge of quality management systems (QMS), ISO standards, and regulatory compliance.
	Experience in plastic manufacturing processes will be a strong advantage.
	Excellent leadership, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	Strong analytical ability with attention to detail.


Skills & Competencies:


	In-depth understanding of quality tools, techniques, and statistical process control.
	Ability to manage and motivate a team effectively.
	Proficiency in MS Office and quality management software.
	Strong organizational and time management skills.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly

Method of Application 
Interested candidates should send their resume to: reliablesteelplasticrecruit@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Service Representative",
  "description": "Comatrix Collection Service - We are a professional collection service provider that deals with helping various loan agencies in retrieving back their bad-loans as fast and effectively as possible.

We make calls to customers to pay their outstanding debts, Send messages to customers, Guide customers through the payment process, Persuade reluctant customers to make payment promptly, Meet weekly and monthly targets, Give proper and correct report of work.

We build a professional team with experienced collectors for every loan agency, using SMS, calls, emails, various social media platforms to remind and encourage overdue customers to make repayments. Co-matrix provides financial solutions by helping loan companies recover back bad debts.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Customer Service Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Abule Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	As a growing Fintech company, we are looking for dedicated professionals who are passionate about helping people and solving problems.


Responsibilities


	Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or chat in a timely and professional manner
	Resolve customer issues efficiently while maintaining a positive attitude
	Document customer interactions in our CRM system
	Work collaboratively with other departments to improve customer satisfaction.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree
	1+ year of customer service experience (preferred)
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong problem-solving abilities
	Comfortable using customer support tools and CRM platforms.


Salary
N90,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@comatrix-collection.com&nbsp;using &quot;Customer Service Representative&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Customer Service Representative Job at Comatrix Collection Service




        
    

        
        Comatrix Collection Service - We are a professional collection service provider that deals with helping various loan agencies in retrieving back their bad-loans as fast and effectively as possible.

We make calls to customers to pay their outstanding debts, Send messages to customers, Guide customers through the payment process, Persuade reluctant customers to make payment promptly, Meet weekly and monthly targets, Give proper and correct report of work.

We build a professional team with experienced collectors for every loan agency, using SMS, calls, emails, various social media platforms to remind and encourage overdue customers to make repayments. Co-matrix provides financial solutions by helping loan companies recover back bad debts.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Abule Egba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	As a growing Fintech company, we are looking for dedicated professionals who are passionate about helping people and solving problems.


Responsibilities


	Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or chat in a timely and professional manner
	Resolve customer issues efficiently while maintaining a positive attitude
	Document customer interactions in our CRM system
	Work collaboratively with other departments to improve customer satisfaction.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s Degree
	1+ year of customer service experience (preferred)
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Strong problem-solving abilities
	Comfortable using customer support tools and CRM platforms.


Salary
N90,000 / Month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@comatrix-collection.com using "Customer Service Representative" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
